title: India's capital
text: What is the capital of India?

title: Filling Buckets
text: It takes 3 minutes to fill a bucket with the cold water tap and 6 minutes with the hot water tap. How much time in minutes will it take to fill the bucket with both taps on at the same time?
hint: In one minute, cold water tap fills 1/3 of the bucket and hot water tap fills 1/6 of the bucket. So in one minute, they tohether fill ...

title: Breaking Chocolate
hint: What happens to the number of pieces when you break one of the pieces into two?
